biography: Jonas, a familiar name at the Hector Trophée, hails from Vantaan Golfpuisto. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Jonas has always been admired by fans for his ability to remain calm under pressure.

While Jonas has not yet captured the coveted Hector Trophée, nor the individual Victor Trophy, his presence has been felt, having competed in the event twice. His strategic play and consistent performance have made him a formidable competitor.
Although Jonas is not expected to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his past contributions to the tournament are fondly remembered.
